title: New Champ Select: Can use a skin you don't own.
body:
So here we are, I'm playing ranked draft mode with 4 of my friends and in champ select everything went smoothly. It was in the loading screen which 2 of us had skins equipped that we didn't own. (Ice Toboggan Corki/Marauder Olaf). Also at the end of this game, we had won but didn't get any lp or ip, yet it shows on our match history.

Edit: I forgot to mention this happened after we had traded champions back and forth in champ select.

replies.body: Except in my case, the person I was trading with didn't even own the skin I ended up having (Rusty Blitzcrank)

Hey DeputyDonger36,

Thank you for the report! We'll investigate the issue!

I had the same thing happen last night, except it was on the enemy team.  Player A needs to trade with a skin that player B doesn't have.  When in game player B plays with a skin that they do not own (think of the skin boost in ARAM).
Legit I've tasted the rusty blitz and now i can't ever go back....the status...the power...too real

I had this same issue as well with my Duo Bot Heimerdinger. Somehow I had Rusty Blitzcrank unlocked after we traded in champ select.

I wonder if it has to do with Heimer as your summoner name says DeputyDonger....

Riot if you fix this bug can you just do me a solid and gift me Rusty Blitz...
I would much like black alistar aswell XD
